backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a social media platform with user profiles, video reels, follow/unfollow functionality, profanity filtering, and role-based access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state to new schema by adding empty follower and following maps while preserving existing user profiles and reels data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including members page, follow/unfollow buttons, follower/following lists, and personalized feed with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to their descriptions, covering components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the social media application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes using warm earth tones for a photography-focused aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining routes for video feed, reels, members, profiles, followers, and following pages, with authentication checks and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Interactive button component that toggles between follow and unfollow states with loading indicators, toast notifications, and automatic hiding on own profile.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header navigation, logo, and action buttons (Upload, Profile, Logout). Includes a dialog for uploading reels and handles user authentication state.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Displays a member card with avatar, username, follower count, and bio. Links to the user's profile page.
Form for editing user profile including username, bio, and profile picture with upload progress tracking. Handles validation errors and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for initial profile setup requiring username, optional bio, and profile picture. Non-dismissible modal that validates input and handles profanity checking.
frontend/src/components/ReelCard.tsx: Video player card component for displaying reels with autoplay, mute toggle, uploader info, and description overlay. Manages video playback based on active state.
frontend/src/components/ReelUploadForm.t: Form for uploading video reels with description field, file selection, and upload progress tracking. Validates video files and handles profanity checking on descriptions.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: React component that displays a video reel card with play/pause and mute controls, showing the uploader's avatar, username, and description with hover interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient with delegation identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, reels, follows, and feed data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using HSL values for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/FollowersPage.tsx: Page component that displays a grid of follower cards for a user profile, fetching follower principals and their associated profiles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Displays a list of users that a specific profile is following, fetching their profiles and follower counts. Includes navigation back to the profile and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity authentication button and branding. Shows loading state during login process.
frontend/src/pages/MembersPage.tsx: Displays all community members by fetching unique uploaders from reels, showing their profiles and follower counts in a grid layout. Includes loading skeletons and empty state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing avatar, bio, follower/following counts, and uploaded reels. Supports profile editing for own profile and follow button for others.
frontend/src/pages/ReelsFeedPage.tsx: Full-screen vertical scrolling feed of reels with snap-to-viewport behavior. Tracks active reel index based on scroll position.
frontend/src/pages/VideoFeedPage.tsx: Grid-based video feed page displaying all reels in a responsive layout. Shows empty state when no videos exist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage support for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extends theme with custom spacing, fonts, animations, and includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file for a social media app called 'Social Reel' that tracks implemented features (members page, follow/unfollow, follower lists, filtered reels feed) and pending feature requests (social reels, profiles, Facebook/Telegram-inspired features).
